Package edu.bu.cs411.Registrar

Class RegistrationDetails

java.lang.Object
edu.bu.cs411.Registrar.RegistrationDetails
public class RegistrationDetails extends Object
Main Entry Class for the RegistrationDetails of the Program. Maintains all the global details for the Registration Software.
